line_1: Wild Laughter, Noise, and thoughtless Joy,
line_2: Scared at thy frown terrific, fly

line_1: The House of Mourning now is turn'd to Joy:
line_2: No more shall Woes the fainting Heart destroy;

line_1: With every sacred joy.
line_2: Shall be my sweet employ;

line_1: That blasts the promis'd joy.
line_2: See Expectation fly;
